verses.verse: גֶּ֤פֶן <S%H1612><s%> vine בּוֹקֵק֙ <S%H1238><s%> [is] an empty יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel פְּרִ֖י <S%H6529><s%> fruit יְשַׁוֶּה־ <S%H7737><s%> he bringeth forth לּ֑וֹ כְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> unto himself according to the multitude לְפִרְי֗וֹ <S%H6529><s%> of his fruit הִרְבָּה֙ <S%H7235><s%> he hath increased לַֽמִּזְבְּח֔וֹת <S%H4196><s%> the altars כְּט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> according to the goodness לְאַרְצ֔וֹ <S%H776><s%> of his land הֵיטִ֖יבוּ <S%H3190><s%> the better מַצֵּבֽוֹת׃ <S%H4676><s%> images

חָלַ֥ק <S%H2505><s%> is divided לִבָּ֖ם <S%H3820><s%> Their heart עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יֶאְשָׁ֑מוּ <S%H816><s%> now shall they be found faulty ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> the LORD יַעֲרֹ֣ף <S%H6202><s%> he shall break down מִזְבְּחוֹתָ֔ם <S%H4196><s%> their altars יְשֹׁדֵ֖ד <S%H7703><s%> he shall spoil מַצֵּבוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4676><s%> their images

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Surely עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> now יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> For now they shall say אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> have מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> We have no king לָ֑נוּ כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Surely לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יָרֵ֙אנוּ֙ <S%H3372><s%> because we feared אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> not the LORD וְהַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> what then should a king מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יַּֽעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> do לָּֽנוּ׃

דִּבְּר֣וּ <S%H1696><s%> They have spoken דְבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> words אָל֥וֹת <S%H422><s%> swearing שָׁ֖וְא <S%H7723><s%> falsely כָּרֹ֣ת <S%H3772><s%> in making בְּרִ֑ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant וּפָרַ֤ח <S%H6524><s%> springeth up כָּרֹאשׁ֙ <S%H7219><s%> as hemlock מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> thus judgment עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> in תַּלְמֵ֥י <S%H8525><s%> in the furrows שָׂדָֽי׃ <S%H7704><s%> of the field

לְעֶגְלוֹת֙ <S%H5697><s%> because of the calves בֵּ֣ית אָ֔וֶן <S%H1007><s%> of Bethaven יָג֖וּרוּ <S%H1481><s%> shall fear שְׁכַ֣ן <S%H7934><s%> The inhabitants שֹֽׁמְר֑וֹן <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> Indeed אָבַ֨ל <S%H56><s%> thereof shall mourn עָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> over עַמּ֗וֹ <S%H5971><s%> for the people וּכְמָרָיו֙ <S%H3649><s%> over it and the priests עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> Over יָגִ֔ילוּ <S%H1523><s%> thereof [that] rejoiced עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כְּבוֹד֖וֹ <S%H3519><s%> on it for the glory כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> since גָלָ֥ה <S%H1540><s%> thereof because it is departed מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> itself אוֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> לְאַשּׁ֣וּר <S%H804><s%> unto Assyria יוּבָ֔ל <S%H2986><s%> It shall be also carried מִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> [for] a present לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to king יָרֵ֑ב <S%H3377><s%> Jareb בָּשְׁנָה֙ <S%H1317><s%> shame אֶפְרַ֣יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim יִקָּ֔ח <S%H3947><s%> shall receive וְיֵב֥וֹשׁ <S%H954><s%> shall be ashamed יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel מֵעֲצָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6098><s%> of his own counsel

נִדְמֶ֥ה <S%H1820><s%> is cut off שֹׁמְר֖וֹן <S%H8111><s%> [As for] Samaria מַלְכָּ֑הּ <S%H4428><s%> her king כְּקֶ֖צֶף <S%H7110><s%> as the foam עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> upon מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> the water

וְנִשְׁמְד֞וּ <S%H8045><s%> shall be destroyed בָּמ֣וֹת <S%H1116><s%> The high places אָ֗וֶן <S%H205><s%> wickedness חַטַּאת֙ <S%H2403><s%> the sin יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ק֣וֹץ <S%H6975><s%> the thorn וְדַרְדַּ֔ר <S%H1863><s%> and the thistle יַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> shall come up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִזְבְּחוֹתָ֑ם <S%H4196><s%> on their altars וְאָמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> and they shall say לֶֽהָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> to the mountains כַּסּ֔וּנוּ <S%H3680><s%> Cover וְלַגְּבָע֖וֹת <S%H1389><s%> us and to the hills נִפְל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> Fall עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and ס

מִימֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> from the days הַגִּבְעָ֔ה <S%H1390><s%> of Gibeah חָטָ֖אתָ <S%H2398><s%> thou hast sinned יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> There עָמָ֔דוּ <S%H5975><s%> there they stood לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תַשִּׂיגֵ֧ם <S%H5381><s%> did not overtake בַּגִּבְעָ֛ה <S%H1390><s%> in Gibeah מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> the battle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> against the children עַֽלְוָֽה׃ <S%H5932><s%> of iniquity

בְּאַוָּתִ֖י <S%H185><s%> [It is] in my desire וְאֶסֳּרֵ֑ם <S%H3256><s%> that I should chastise וְאֻסְּפ֤וּ <S%H622><s%> shall be gathered עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> against עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> them and the people בְּאָסְרָ֖ם <S%H631><s%> against them when they shall bind לִשְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> themselves in their two [עֵינֹתָם כ] (עֹונֹתָֽם׃ <S%H5868><s%> mighty ק)

וְאֶפְרַ֜יִם <S%H669><s%> And Ephraim עֶגְלָ֤ה <S%H5697><s%> [is as] an heifer מְלֻמָּדָה֙ <S%H3925><s%> [that is] taught אֹהַ֣בְתִּי <S%H157><s%> [and] loveth לָד֔וּשׁ <S%H1758><s%> to tread out וַאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I עָבַ֔רְתִּי <S%H5674><s%> [the corn] but I passed over עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over ט֖וּב <S%H2898><s%> upon her fair צַוָּארָ֑הּ <S%H6676><s%> neck אַרְכִּ֤יב <S%H7392><s%> to ride אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> I will make Ephraim יַחֲר֣וֹשׁ <S%H2790><s%> shall plow יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah יְשַׂדֶּד־ <S%H7702><s%> shall break his clods ל֖וֹ יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> [and] Jacob

זִרְע֨וּ <S%H2232><s%> Sow לָכֶ֤ם לִצְדָקָה֙ <S%H6666><s%> to yourselves in righteousness קִצְר֣וּ <S%H7114><s%> reap לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> in חֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> mercy נִ֥ירוּ <S%H5214><s%> break up לָכֶ֖ם נִ֑יר <S%H5215><s%> your fallow ground וְעֵת֙ <S%H6256><s%> for [it is] time לִדְר֣וֹשׁ <S%H1875><s%> to seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until יָב֕וֹא <S%H935><s%> till he come וְיֹרֶ֥ה <S%H3384><s%> and rain צֶ֖דֶק <S%H6664><s%> righteousness לָכֶֽם׃

חֲרַשְׁתֶּם־ <S%H2790><s%> Ye have plowed רֶ֛שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> wickedness עַוְלָ֥תָה <S%H5766><s%> iniquity קְצַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H7114><s%> ye have reaped אֲכַלְתֶּ֣ם <S%H398><s%> ye have eaten פְּרִי־ <S%H6529><s%> the fruit כָ֑חַשׁ <S%H3585><s%> of lies כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because בָטַ֥חְתָּ <S%H982><s%> because thou didst trust בְדַרְכְּךָ֖ <S%H1870><s%> in thy way בְּרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> in the multitude גִּבּוֹרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1368><s%> of thy mighty men

וְקָ֣אם <S%H6965><s%> arise שָׁאוֹן֮ <S%H7588><s%> Therefore shall a tumult בְּעַמֶּךָ֒ <S%H5971><s%> among thy people וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מִבְצָרֶ֣יךָ <S%H4013><s%> and all thy fortresses יוּשַּׁ֔ד <S%H7703><s%> shall be spoiled כְּשֹׁ֧ד <S%H7701><s%> spoiled שַֽׁלְמַ֛ן <S%H8020><s%> as Shalman בֵּ֥ית אַֽרְבֵ֖אל <S%H1009><s%> Betharbel בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> of battle אֵ֥ם <S%H517><s%> the mother עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> upon [her] children רֻטָּֽשָׁה׃ <S%H7376><s%> was dashed in pieces

כָּ֗כָה <S%H3602><s%> So עָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> do לָכֶם֙ בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> shall Bethel מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> unto you because רָעַ֣ת <S%H7451><s%> of your great רָֽעַתְכֶ֑ם <S%H7451><s%> wickedness בַּשַּׁ֕חַר <S%H7837><s%> in a morning נִדְמֹ֥ה <S%H1820><s%> utterly נִדְמָ֖ה <S%H1820><s%> be cut off מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> shall the king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel
